text: Endopappus is a genus of flowering plants in the daisy family described as a genus in 1860.Schultz, Carl Heinrich Bipontinus. 1860. Boletín de la Sociedad Cubana de Orquídeas 8: 369Tropicos, Endopappus Sch. Bip. There is only one known species, Endopappus macrocarpus, native to North Africa (Morocco, Algeria, Tunisia, Libya).The Plant List, search for EndopappusFlann, C (ed) 2009+ Global Compositae Checklist ;subspecies * Endopappus macrocarpus subsp. macrocarpus - Morocco, Algeria, Tunisia, Libya * Endopappus macrocarpus subsp. maroccanus (Jahand., Maire & Weiller) Ibn Tattou \- Morocco ==References== Category:Monotypic Asteraceae genera Category:Flora of North Africa
title: Endopappus
